data.text: When Josip Broz Tito was born on 7 May 1892, in Kumrovec, Krapina-Zagorje, Croatia, his father, Franjo Broz, was 35 and his mother, Marija JaverÅ¡ek, was 28. He married Pelagija Belousova in 1920. They were the parents of at least 2 sons and 1 daughter. In 1953, his occupation is listed as president of yugoslavia. He died on 4 May 1980, in Ljubljana, Slovenia, Yugoslavia, at the age of 87, and was buried in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia.
